revision.comment: More Data-->Database as a Service corrections. Added "Cloud database" in See also
revision.text:
{{Infobox Dotcom company | company_name = MongoHQ | company_slogan = | owner = | company_logo = [[File:MongoHQ Logo.png]] | caption = | company_type = [[Private company|Private]] | foundation = | founder = Ben Wyrosdick
Jason McCay | area_served = [[World]]wide | location_city = [[Mountain View, California]] | location_country = [[United States]] | key_people = | revenue = | homepage = [http://mongohq.com mongohq.com] | screenshot = | caption = | num_employees = | url = [http://mongohq.com mongohq.com] | registration = Required | launch_date = | current_status = Public | language = English | advertising = | alexa = | website_type = Database as a Service }} '''MongoHQ''' is a private, Database-as-a-Service (DBaaS) platform for securely hosting and managing shared and dedicated [[MongoDB]] instances. MongoHQ is used by a majority of the cloud hosting service [[Heroku]]'s MongoDB users, being the only remote Mongo host for over a year.[http://blog.heroku.com/archives/2010/4/30/mongohq_add_on_public_beta/ MongoHQ Add-on Public Beta | Heroku Blog | Apr 30, 2010] MongoHQ is an alumnus of the [[Y_Combinator_(company)|Y Combinator]] business incubator, Summer 2011 class. In July 2011, MongoHQ announced it received its first round of angel investment of $417,000 from Y Combinator, Lerer And SV Angel.[http://techcrunch.com/2011/06/24/mongohq-raises-417k-from-y-combinator-lehrer-and-sv-angel/ MongoHQ Raises $417K From Y Combinator, Lerer And SV Angel | TechCrunch | June 24, 2011] Shortly thereafter, MongoHQ acquired the competing Mongo host and automated provisioning software of MongoMachines.[http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=2819301 MongoHQ Acquires MongoMachine | Y Combinator News | July 28, 2011] MongoHQ currently integrates with 4 [[PaaS]] providers, with more slated in the future. [http://docs.mongohq.com/platforms Platform (PaaS) Partners | MongoHQ Partners | Jan 14, 2012] They were named #4 in the top "10 Enterprise Cloud App Services of 2011" by ''Read Write Web''.[http://www.readwriteweb.com/archives/top_10_enterprise_cloud_apps_and_services_of_2011.php Top 10 Enterprise Cloud Apps and Services of 2011 | Read Write Web | Dec 26, 2011] ==See also== *[[MongoDB]] *Database as a Service *[[Cloud database]] *[[NoSQL]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{official website|http://mongohq.com}} * {{crunchbase}} [[Category:NoSQL]] [[Category:Cloud computing providers]]
